description: This trap is sent to management station(s) when the
HTTP server is under Denial of Service attack. The HTTP
and HTTPS connections are sampled at a 15 second
interval. This trap is sent every 1 minute while the HTTP
server detects it is under attack.
Number of HTTP connection attempts over the past 15
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-WEBMGT-MIB::httpConnectionStats

description: Number of HTTPS connection attempts over the past 15
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-WEBMGT-MIB::httpsConnectionStats

description: Source IP of recent connection requesting an invalid URL.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-WEBMGT-MIB::httpServerDoSAttackSrcIp
